title: electricalIntro
body:
<< headSprites regis>>
It's so dark in here.
HELLO!
ANY BODY THERE?
There should be people here!
Where is everyone?
I can't see anything!
Wait!
I got my lighter!
<< headSprites none>>
<< lighterSFX>> *click*
<< lighterSFX>>*click*
<< headSprites regis>> 
C'mon work, please.
<< headSprites none>> 
<< lighterSFX>>*click*
<< lighterActivate>> << headSprites regis>>Yes! So where are w-
!!!
I-i-is that bl-blood?
<< headSprites none>> << kingVelociraptorSFX>>...
<< headSprites regis>> 
NO!
I'M NOT DOING THIS!
<< regisRunAway>> GET ME OUT OF THIS PLACE!
IT'S LOCKED!!!
THIS CAN'T BE HAPPENING!
I DON"T WANT TO DIEEEEEEEE!
<< headSprites none>>
<< radio>>(Incoming Transmission...)    
<< headSprites muldoon>> Hey kid, just wanted to check on your and Regis's progress so far. Can you put him on?
<< headSprites regis>> I WANT TO GO HOME DAMMIT!
I NEVER SHOULD HAVE WORKED HERE!
<< headSprites muldoon>> 
Is that him? What happened down there?
Y'know what, forget it!
Kid, we need you to turn on the power, soon!
The dinosaurs have escaped and are surrounding the Lodge!
If the electrical fences don't get activated soon, they'll swarm us inside!
You're our only hope to survive!
Don't let us down.
<< headSprites none>>
<< radio>> The radio went silent.

title: regisOne
body:
You approach Regis.
<< headSprites regis>>
AAGUUGAUH!!!
DON'T KILL ME!
...
Oh, t-ttech, thank god it's just you.
I-I uh, don't t-think I can go any f-further than this.
I'll stay back and um, 
watch the d-door.

title: regisTwo
body:
<< headSprites regis>>
AHH!!
...
T-tech, can you [i]PLEASE[/i] stop doing that!

title: powerRoomDoorOne
body:
The door to the power room you need to get into.
Though it seems to be locked.
You're going to have to look for a key to unlock it.

title: lockedDoors
body: These doors don't seem to have any door handles and seem to be controlled remotely.

title: medkitOne
body:
It's a medkit, inside there seems to be bandages, medicine,-
and an emergency bagel hidden inside of breakable glass.

title: pitOne
body:
It's a huge pit that you can't see the bottom of.
You might be able to jump across.
But then, you remember that you don't know how to jump.

title: notePit
body:
Lousy grate!
The stupid thing keeps falling off every 2 weeks. 
Tell that lousy Greg to fill that hole in already, it's been months!
We just can't keep buying temporary grates, it's a waste of money!

title: noteGrate
body:
Temporary temporary grate for use in case the temporary temporary grate fails until the temporary non-temporary grate arrives.
You decide to temporarily borrow the grate.

title: noteLocker
body:
PSA- STOP LEAVING YOUR LOCKERS OPEN!
There has been an increase in complaints of stolen items but upon further investigation, the victims left their lockers [i]unlocked[/i].
WHAT DO YOU EXPECT TO HAPPEN!?!?
P.S - Greg, [i]PLEASE[/i] stop filling up the unlocked lockers with bagels!

title: noteTerminal
body:
PSA- DON'T FORGET YOUR ACCESS KEYS!
It has come to my attention that most of you don't know your security codes due to you all asking me for them everyday.
So I will just write them down here.
It's not like anyone else will be down here so who cares?
The security codes are-
Supply Closet - 8##2
Work Area - ###5
The New Room - ####
P.S - GREG!!!!
STOP COVERING THE CODES!!!

title: notePower
body:
PSA- ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!
Ok so one of you (not naming names), thought it would be funny to keep turning the power on and off,-
-so from now on it's being kept LOCKED!
If for some [i]VALID[/i] reason you need to get in, come see me cause I have the only key!
P.S -And before you ask, no, rebooting the power to fix the bagel dispenser is [i]NOT[/i] a valid reason Greg!

title: bulletinBoard
body: The Bulletin Board is filled with safety warnings and regulation flyers covered up with graffiti of crudely drawn stick figures fighting crudely drawn dinosaurs.

title: lockerBagels
body: The locker seems to be filled with bagels, though they seem way past their expiration date.

title: noteBarbedWire
body:
PSA- BARBED WIRE ON HOLD
The park has received a shipment of barbed wire and has nowhere to put it, so it's staying here until further notice.
PLEASE! PLEASE! PLEASE!
Do not touch the barbed wire under any circumstance!
It is a serious hazard and could really get someone hurt!
